body.name: BesLowe 48FT S14 Solar String Lights Outdoor with Remote Controller, Solar Powered Patio Lights Waterproof with LED Edison Bulbs, Dimmable Hanging Lights for Outside Backyard Porch, USB Rechargeable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 14 hrs 6 mins
features: ❤【Upgraded Solar String Lights with Remote】Beslowe S14 solar patio lights with remote is a latest version that caters to all your lighting needs for outdoor spaces. With just a click of the remote, you can effortlessly turn the lights on or off, adjust the brightness and switch between various lighting modes. The added timing function eliminates the need for manual shutdown, saving you valuable time. Don't wait any longer! Get these lights now and transform your surroundings!

❤【Solar-powered & USB Rechargeable】With a large-capacity and efficient solar panel, the outdoor string lights can work up to 8 hours when fully charged. The 180°adjustable design allows you to effortlessly position the panel for optimal sun exposure. Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for wall outlets and save on your electricity bills. Additionally, the USB rechargeable feature serves as a backup during cloudy or rainy days (the charging cable is not included).

❤【Dimming Function & More Lighting Modes】The LED string lights can be dimmed by the included remote controller from 25% to 100% with four different levels. No need to purchase an additional dimmer! Choose from a range of lighting modes, including steady on, breath (speed adjustable), and flash(speed adjustable). These versatile options allow you to create stunning lighting effects tailored to your exact preferences, all at your fingertips.

❤【Weather-resistant & Shatterproof】Designed with strong rubber strands and fully-sealed sockets, our solar string lights work well in all weather conditions. Crafted with lightweight yet durable plastic bulbs, the waterproof patio lights ensure enhanced safety. They are a perfect choice for various occasions such as barbecues, parties, camping trips, weddings, and all outdoor spaces like patio, yard, pergola, deck, bistro, umbrella, and pool area.

❤【Easy Installation】 This 48FT solar string lights is equipped with 16 S14 bulbs(1 spare), evenly spaced 3FT apart. You have the flexibility to hang the lights using screws, hooks, or cords. The solar panel can be securely fixed with screws or inserted into the ground. Before using the lights, it's important to press the button located at the back of the solar panel to switch it ON. Once activated, you can conveniently control the lights with the remote.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dimming Function The included remote controllers serve as dimmer switches so you can freely adjust the brightness level from 25% to 100%. No hassle of buying extra dimmer! More Lighting Modes There are 3 lighting modes available and the speed for breath mode and flash mode is adjustable. Just create the lighting effects as you desire! 2 Timer Modes We equip these outdoor string lights with timing function, eradicating the necessity for manual shutdown. Bring much convenience to your life!

2 Ways to Install The design allows you to easily charge the solar panel no matter how you install it. If you are looking for bright yet energy-saving string lights, BesLowe S14 solar string lights are definitely a perfect choice! 3 Ways of Hanging These outdoor solar lights are easy to install with the cable tie and cup hook. Great for indoor room decor and outside hanging lights of patio, garden, bistro, porch, balcony, etc. Dimensions & Details This lastest version of 100FT S14 solar string lights is equipped with 32 LED Edison bulbs(2 spares), evenly spaced 3FT apart. Easily add brightness to your house with no electricity cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Light Set
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this set of lights.....love pulling into my yard and seeing them lit up. The "Edison" style is fun and stylish. Set up was a breeze. From the first day I set them up they've been bringing me joy in the yard. If nobody is outside, I keep them set at 25%. The remote is very handy if I forget to turn them down after having been on 100% for a get together - from inside the house. One time all summer long I took the charging unit in the house to charge via usb. Other than that, the sunlight provided kept these lights going beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised by how nice these lights are. They are really bright and sturdy. They even came with an extra bulb. We wove the lights into an over head trellis (which unfortunately looks like a bunch of dead sticks in winter), to illuminate the path below. The lights are bright enough to shine the way and they don’t mind getting wet (as they are in the photo). I like them a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So pretty n lightweight nice big bulbs nice size solar panel n it’s chargeable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall Good product
reviews.reviewText: The product packaging was damaged and 2 bulbs did not work, however there were 2 spare bulbs. so giving a 4 star.Like the option of USB charging and the functions of remote. Just got it, so can't say anything about the life of the product yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Work really well for what I wanted them for. However the bulbs are spaced so far apart. You almost need multiple sets to make it look aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are very bright and last a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These lights are a game-changer for outdoor lighting. With their remote controller and dimmable LED Edison bulbs, you have complete control over the ambiance of your patio or backyard. The solar-powered feature is a bonus, making them eco-friendly and hassle-free. Plus, they are waterproof, ensuring they can withstand any weather conditions. The USB rechargeable option is an added convenience, ensuring you never run out of power. Overall, these lights are a perfect addition to any outdoor space, providing both style and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won’t stay on, even with constant wired power to line.
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if there is some safety turn off after x amount of hours? This product would not stay on and would go dark even if on plug in power during a cloudy day.Tried all settings and still can’t get the lights to stay on longer than 7-8hours.Tried to return but window closed before I could request a new set or refund.Con-The packaging was Awful and took over an hour to de-tangle lights from box. Worth packing of an item that I’ve ever purchased! Took longer to untangle from box than it did to hang them outside and angle panel to catch UV as much as possible
